name: GerbilQuest
description:
Press X for Interaction
LMB and drag for "Gerbil"

Embark on the quest of the century with Jerma the gerbil.
Brave numerous obstacles including rats, spiders, and a door.

Produced for a Game Jam with the theme "You are the Projectile" and the challenge "Only two keys"

Made by Aidan Fisk and Edmund Wohlmuth
Additional assets used are listed in the "ReadMe.txt" file
